page.title: 17Everyday Life.
page.content: My name is{Ashley Michael Smith.}I live in a bungalow near our school. My Dad works for the Ministry of Defence but my Mum does not work. She stops at home and cleans and does odd jobs around the house. Our home is in quite good condition and we are hardly ever short of anything. We are a happy family but we do argue sometimes. Most Sundays we take a walk in the woods or go fishing at the beach. My name is{Nathan John Hicks.}I get up each Tuesday at 0800 hrs and go to school which starts at 0900 hrs. We have Assembly, Maths, Reading and English in the morning. I have a school dinner. My favourite is fish and chips followed by ice cream. After dinner we do Poetry, Nature and Games. In the winter we do football and in summer cricket and athletics. School finishes at 1545 hrs and I go home.
